trigger: A 73 kDa protein was identified by this analysis : this protein is highly enriched in cell lines of B lymphoid origin as compared to pancreatic beta-cells and fibroblast cells .
A 73 kDa protein was identified by this analysis : this protein is highly enriched in cell lines of B lymphoid origin as compared to pancreatic beta-cells and fibroblast cells .

The detection of this protein selectively in extracts of lymphoid cells correlates with the presence of the E box - binding activity LEF1 / BCF1 in these cells ; this binding activity was previously shown to be efficiently recognized by antiserum directed against <extra_id_0> E2A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene products .

The detection of this protein selectively in extracts of lymphoid cells correlates with the presence of the E box - binding activity LEF1 / BCF1 in these cells ; this binding activity was previously shown to be efficiently recognized by antiserum directed against E2A gene products .

Transfection of cells with full length <extra_id_0> E2A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> cDNA leads to appearance of protein co - migrating with the 73 kDa protein on SDS gel electrophoresis and co - migrating with LEF1 / BCF1 on mobility shift analysis .
